name: market for bamboo pole | bamboo pole | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/24717/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This dataset represents the market for bamboo poles in the Philippines. Transport distances were estimated using the methodology presented in Zea Escamilla and Habert (2017).;Bamboo poles are used for the construction of columns, beams, or struts and the production of other bamboo-based construction materials.;Reference: ;Zea Escamilla, E., Habert, G. Method and application of characterisation of life cycle impact data of construction materials using geographic information systems. Int J Life Cycle Assess 22, 1210â€“1219 (2017). https://doi.org/10.1007/s11367-016-1238-y

This dataset starts with bamboo pole leaving the gate of the producing entity, ready for distribution to consuming entities.

The activity ends with the bamboo pole being delivered to the consuming entity.
category: C:Manufacturing/16:Manufacture of wood and of products of wood and cork, except furniture; manufacture of articles of straw and plaiting materials/162:Manufacture of products of wood, cork, straw and plaiting materials

exchanges.description: Estimated value using the methodology presented in Zea Escamilla, E. and G. Habert, Method and application of characterisation of life cycle impact data of construction materials using geographic information systems. The International Journal of Life Cycle Assessment, 2016: p. It is assumed that bamboo poles in the Philippines are transported 210.7 Kg*Km.
